lexUnit.name: date.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: go on a date with

sentence.text: Friends say she never recovered from hearing Gilbey , who she had been dating for two years , tell Diana he loved her -- 53 times in the 23 minute call .
The 24-year-old star , who once dated INXS singer Michael Hutchence , said her ambition is to settle down , have a house on the beach , and children .
Lady Diana Spencer first met Charles when he was dating her sister Sarah in 1977 .
I dated her myself , as a matter of fact -- well , actually , we 're married now .
Pattie is living proof that if you live with a man , you discover a lot you did n't know when you were just dating him .

The two of them dated for a while , but it did n't work out .

They dated , they rowed and they finally got married .
